title: Expert Language Education Design Workshop Based on Video Conferencing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in video conferencing platforms and intermediate language skills
context.additional_context: Program aimed at strengthening language communication competencies for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields within real-time video conferencing settings

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use over 20 specialized language expressions in a video conferencing environment
Learners can apply video conferencing etiquette considering cultural contexts in a VR simulation environment with 80% accuracy
Learners can perform peer feedback-based language revision activities using video conferencing tools at least three times
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
